analysis.description:
Crowdsale.icoStartTime (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#283) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getTimeDiscount (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#321-332)
	- getTotalSoldDiscount (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#332-355)
	- validPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol)

SerenityToken.lock (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#195-216) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocations[_to].value == 0)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#366-390) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#383-386)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#366-390):
	External calls:
	- discountPercents = getDiscount() (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#373-376)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#380-382)

Crowdsale.ethRaised should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#291-292)
Crowdsale.icoStartTime should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6e428d863aa57b457b038ab1f0e34d77f736bae3.sol#283)
